accounts

Class BankAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • accounts.BankAccount
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CheckingAccount, SavingsAccount

    public abstract class BankAccount
extends java.lang.Object
    BankAccount is an abstract class representing the necessary elements of bank accounts of all types. This class is abstract, and as such cannot be used directly for the instantiation of objects.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int accountBalance
      accountBalance is the balance of the account
      java.lang.String accountName
      Every account has three attributes: account name, number, and balance
      int accountNumber
      accountNumber is assigned with the static variable nextAccountNumber

      Constructor for new accounts

    • Constructor Detail

      • BankAccount

        public BankAccount(java.lang.String name,
                   int balance)
        Constructor for new accounts
        Parameters:
        name - a String to represent the account holder
        balance - an integer to represent the opening balance in cents

    • Method Detail

      • deposit

        public void deposit(int cents)
        Method for making deposits into accounts
        Parameters:
        cents - an integer represent the deposit amount in cents

      • withdraw

        public boolean withdraw(int cents)
        Method to make account withdrawals
        Parameters:
        cents - the amount to be withdrawn in cents
        Returns:
        true if withdrawal completed, false otherwise

      • balance

        public int balance()
        Method to get the balance in an account
        Returns:
        the balance in cents (an integer)

      • transfer

        public static boolean transfer(int cents,
                               BankAccount fromAccount,
                               BankAccount toAccount)
        Method to transfer funds between accounts
        Parameters:
        cents - an integer representing the amount to transfer
        fromAccount - represents the account providing the funds
        toAccount - represents the account receiving the funds
        Returns:
        true if transfer can be completed, false otherwise
